blog_entries.title: PermaplanT sprouts!
blog_entries.content: Nature demonstrates the astonishing results of the fusion of two compatible parts, pollen with pistil. We merged botany and informatics, and behold - PermaplanT sprouted! An amazing team from various fields has been working hard to nurture the seedling. Join us and be a part of it!
blog_entries.author: Yvonne Markl

blog_entries.title: Landing Page online!
blog_entries.content: We're giving our first sign of life with this website, even though the app is still being heavily worked on. Speaking of signs of life: just in time for the launch, a special guest visited our PermaplanT founding garden, see gallery. There is only one species of tree frog in Austria, the grass green tree frog. This species uses bushes and trees as its habitat. What's even cooler is that it helps with gardening by devouring numerous pests with its sticky tongue.
blog_entries.author: Yvonne Markl
